data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of East Grand Bahama, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of East Grand Bahama, Bahamas
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of East Grand Bahama, Bahamas to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of East Grand Bahama, Bahamas.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of East Grand Bahama, Bahamas.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of High Rock
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of High Rock, East Grand Bahama, Bahamas.
Father, remind your church in East Grand Bahama that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.prayer: Father, bless the state of East Grand Bahama with a multiplying movement of house churches.
data.verse: ...but indeed, as I live, all the earth will be filled with the glory of the Lord.

data.section_summary:
the state of East Grand Bahama, Bahamas has a population of 51,400.

We estimate East Grand Bahama has 20,355 people who might know Jesus, 28,197 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,848 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 2 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of East Grand Bahama, Bahamas.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight
